title: Remove tooltips from three selected view mode buttons

requirements.summary: Remove tooltips from the three view mode toggle buttons in the toolbar while keeping all other button tooltips unchanged
acceptanceCriteria: The three selected view mode toggle buttons (button[1], button[2], button[3]) have no tooltips
Action buttons (download, link, move, delete) in file rows retain their tooltips
All other UI elements remain unchanged

file_operations.description: Remove the tooltip (title attribute or Tooltip component wrapper) from the three view mode toggle buttons located in the toolbar. These are the list view button, gallery view button, and any third view mode button. Preserve all other tooltips on action buttons (download, link, move, delete) in file rows. Do not modify any other UI elements, styling, or functionality.
